Best model extraction from a collection of PLNfit

Source: R/PLNfamily-class.R
getBestModel.PLNfamily.Rd

Best model extraction from a collection of PLNfit

getBestModel.PLNfamily(object, crit = c("BIC", "ICL", "EBIC", "loglik",
  "R_squared"))

Arguments

object

an R6 object with class PLNfamily
crit

a character for the criterion used to performed the selection. Either "BIC", "EBIC", "ICL", "loglik", "R_squared". Default is "BIC".

Value

Send back a object with class PLNfit.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
